content_html: The number of Japanese centenarians rose to 99,763 in September, with women making up 88% of the total.
content_text: The number of Japanese centenarians rose to 99,763 in September, with women making up 88% of the total.
summary: The number of Japanese centenarians rose to 99,763 in September, with women making up 88% of the total.
title: Japan sets record of nearly 100,000 people aged over 100
